items.name: my-account/user-mfa-management
items.title: User MFA Management
items.description: A block for managing Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) factors, including enrollment and deletion.

items.name: my-org/org-details-edit
items.title: Organization Management
items.description: A block for managing organization details, including editing organization settings and branding, with delete functionality.

items.name: my-org/domain-table
items.title: Domain Management Table
items.description: A block for managing organization domains, including creating, verifying, configuring identity providers, and deleting domains.

items.name: my-org/sso-provider-table
items.title: SSO Provider Table
items.description: A block for managing SSO identity providers in a table format, including create, edit, delete, enable/disable, and remove from organization capabilities.

items.name: my-org/sso-provider-create
items.title: SSO Provider Creation Wizard
items.description: A multi-step wizard for creating SSO identity providers with support for multiple strategies including SAMLP, OIDC, ADFS, Okta, Google Workspace, Azure AD, and PingFederate.

items.name: my-org/sso-provider-edit
items.title: SSO Provider Edit
items.description: A comprehensive block for editing SSO identity providers with tabs for provider configuration, SCIM provisioning settings, and domain management. Includes token management, field mappings, and domain verification capabilities.
